channel.title: Basic yet a question I would like answered!
channel.description:
Hello,
I was just wondering if there was a way to create a peice of land, or maybe there is just a peice of land, on the server base that you could just create from scratch, and the only way to get to it would be a command or something. I would like to know this very much because I would like to make a moderators island/city or something out of this. I have seen it done (I think in my first time experiences with servers).

item.title: Basic yet a question I would like answered!
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

  1. 100% Possible

  2. Far Wilderness

  3. Etrana Island

  4. Karajama

  5. Ship Wreck Island

  6. Monkey Island

  7. Castle wars

It can be done with something like

adminZone(int X, int Y){
if(coords = 5000 || 5000| 3000||3000){
if playerRights = >2{
Welcome
}else{
No
}
}

Just make that real code

Read full topic
